### Linear regression

A simple, one-variable Bayesian linear regression model using an exponential-normal prior. 
A exponential-normal prior can be interpreted as the frequentist LASSO.

```{r linear_greta}
# variables & priors
int  <- variable()
sd   <- inverse_gamma(1, 1)

lambda <- gamma(1, 1)
tau  <- exponential(0.5 * lambda**2)
coef <- normal(0, tau)

# linear predictor
mu <- int + coef * attitude$complaints

# observation model
distribution(attitude$rating) <- normal(mu, sd)
```
